This file contains a packed representation of the entire repository's contents.

or other automated processes.

- When processing this file, use the file path to distinguish
  between different files in the repository.

    <meta charset="UTF-8" />

    <title>Action Figure Miles x Swapnice</title>

    <!--
      IMPORTANT (Tailwind safe mode for Webflow):

      - Build Tailwind locally into ./afm-tailwind.css
      - Use Tailwind config:
          prefix: "afm-"
          corePlugins: { preflight: false }

      - DO NOT use the Tailwind CDN.
      - In Webflow:
          * Paste ONLY the <div id="afm-activate">...</div> into the Code Embed
          * Paste <link ...> + the small scoped <style> below into Page Settings → Inside <head>
          * Paste the <script> at the bottom into Page Settings → Before </body>
    -->
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="./afm-tailwind.css" />

      #afm-activate {
        min-height: 100vh;
        width: 100%;
        background-color: #f5eee0;
      }
      #afm-activate * {
        box-sizing: border-box;
      }
    </style>

          <h2 class="afm-text-2xl md:afm-text-3xl afm-font-bold afm-text-[#1a1a1a] afm-mb-8" style="font-family: 'Bubblebody New', sans-serif;">
            Questions? Answered.
          </h2>

          <div class="afm-divide-y afm-divide-[#1a1a1a]/10">
            <!-- FAQ Item 1 -->
            <details class="afm-group afm-py-5">
              <summary class="afm-flex afm-justify-between afm-items-center afm-cursor-pointer afm-list-none" style="font-family: 'Varela Round', sans-serif;">
                <span class="afm-text-lg afm-font-medium afm-text-[#1a1a1a]">How do I activate my Action Figure Miles shoes?</span>
                <svg class="afm-w-5 afm-h-5 afm-text-[#1a1a1a]/50 afm-transition-transform group-open:afm-rotate-180" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M19 9l-7 7-7-7"/></svg>
              </summary>
              <p class="afm-mt-4 afm-text-[#1a1a1a]/70 afm-leading-relaxed" style="font-family: 'Varela Round', sans-serif;">Download the Swapnice app, scan the NFC chip or QR code embedded in your shoes, and follow the prompts to claim your digital identity. It takes less than a minute.</p>
            </details>

            <!-- FAQ Item 2 -->
            <details class="afm-group afm-py-5">
              <summary class="afm-flex afm-justify-between afm-items-center afm-cursor-pointer afm-list-none" style="font-family: 'Varela Round', sans-serif;">
                <span class="afm-text-lg afm-font-medium afm-text-[#1a1a1a]">What is Swapnice?</span>
                <svg class="afm-w-5 afm-h-5 afm-text-[#1a1a1a]/50 afm-transition-transform group-open:afm-rotate-180" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M19 9l-7 7-7-7"/></svg>
              </summary>
              <p class="afm-mt-4 afm-text-[#1a1a1a]/70 afm-leading-relaxed" style="font-family: 'Varela Round', sans-serif;">Swapnice connects physical products to secure digital identities. It verifies authenticity, tracks ownership history, and unlocks exclusive experiences tied to the items you own.</p>
            </details>

            <!-- FAQ Item 3 -->
            <details class="afm-group afm-py-5">
              <summary class="afm-flex afm-justify-between afm-items-center afm-cursor-pointer afm-list-none" style="font-family: 'Varela Round', sans-serif;">
                <span class="afm-text-lg afm-font-medium afm-text-[#1a1a1a]">Is my information secure?</span>
                <svg class="afm-w-5 afm-h-5 afm-text-[#1a1a1a]/50 afm-transition-transform group-open:afm-rotate-180" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M19 9l-7 7-7-7"/></svg>
              </summary>
              <p class="afm-mt-4 afm-text-[#1a1a1a]/70 afm-leading-relaxed" style="font-family: 'Varela Round', sans-serif;">Absolutely. Your digital identity is encrypted and secured. You control what's shared and who sees it. Swapnice never sells your data.</p>
            </details>

            <!-- FAQ Item 4 -->
            <details class="afm-group afm-py-5">
              <summary class="afm-flex afm-justify-between afm-items-center afm-cursor-pointer afm-list-none" style="font-family: 'Varela Round', sans-serif;">
                <span class="afm-text-lg afm-font-medium afm-text-[#1a1a1a]">What exclusive content do I get access to?</span>
                <svg class="afm-w-5 afm-h-5 afm-text-[#1a1a1a]/50 afm-transition-transform group-open:afm-rotate-180" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M19 9l-7 7-7-7"/></svg>
              </summary>
              <p class="afm-mt-4 afm-text-[#1a1a1a]/70 afm-leading-relaxed" style="font-family: 'Varela Round', sans-serif;">Verified owners unlock access to behind-the-scenes content, early announcements, future drops, and experiences designed exclusively for the AFM community.</p>
            </details>

            <!-- FAQ Item 5 -->
            <details class="afm-group afm-py-5">
              <summary class="afm-flex afm-justify-between afm-items-center afm-cursor-pointer afm-list-none" style="font-family: 'Varela Round', sans-serif;">
                <span class="afm-text-lg afm-font-medium afm-text-[#1a1a1a]">Can I transfer ownership if I sell my shoes?</span>
                <svg class="afm-w-5 afm-h-5 afm-text-[#1a1a1a]/50 afm-transition-transform group-open:afm-rotate-180" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M19 9l-7 7-7-7"/></svg>
              </summary>
              <p class="afm-mt-4 afm-text-[#1a1a1a]/70 afm-leading-relaxed" style="font-family: 'Varela Round', sans-serif;">Yes. The digital identity travels with the physical shoes. When you sell or gift your pair, the new owner can claim the digital certificate through Swapnice.</p>
            </details>

            <!-- FAQ Item 6 -->
            <details class="afm-group afm-py-5">
              <summary class="afm-flex afm-justify-between afm-items-center afm-cursor-pointer afm-list-none" style="font-family: 'Varela Round', sans-serif;">
                <span class="afm-text-lg afm-font-medium afm-text-[#1a1a1a]">Do I need the app to verify authenticity?</span>
                <svg class="afm-w-5 afm-h-5 afm-text-[#1a1a1a]/50 afm-transition-transform group-open:afm-rotate-180" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M19 9l-7 7-7-7"/></svg>
              </summary>
              <p class="afm-mt-4 afm-text-[#1a1a1a]/70 afm-leading-relaxed" style="font-family: 'Varela Round', sans-serif;">The Swapnice app provides the full experience, but anyone can verify authenticity by scanning the NFC chip — no account required for basic verification.</p>
            </details>
          </div>
        </section>

              <!-- Column 2 -->

                <h4 class="afm-text-white afm-font-bold afm-mb-4 afm-text-sm afm-uppercase afm-tracking-wider">Swapnice</h4>

              <!-- Column 3 - Social -->
              <div>

                    <svg class="afm-w-5 afm-h-5" fill="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24"><path d="M18.244 2.25h3.308l-7.227 8.26 8.502 11.24H16.17l-5.214-6.817L4.99 21.75H1.68l7.73-8.835L1.254 2.25H8.08l4.713 6.231zm-1.161 17.52h1.833L7.084 4.126H5.117z"/></svg>

                  </a>

                    <svg class="afm-w-5 afm-h-5" fill="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24"><path d="M19.59 6.69a4.83 4.83 0 01-3.77-4.25V2h-3.45v13.67a2.89 2.89 0 01-5.2 1.74 2.89 2.89 0 012.31-4.64 2.93 2.93 0 01.88.13V9.4a6.84 6.84 0 00-1-.05A6.33 6.33 0 005 20.1a6.34 6.34 0 0010.86-4.43v-7a8.16 8.16 0 004.77 1.52v-3.4a4.85 4.85 0 01-1-.1z"/></svg>

                </div>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>

          <!-- Bottom Bar -->
          <div class="afm-mt-12 afm-pt-8 afm-border-t afm-border-white/20 afm-flex afm-flex-col sm:afm-flex-row afm-justify-between afm-items-center afm-gap-4">

        </footer>

      </div>


      <!-- ============================================
           MODAL - App Download Dialog
           ============================================ -->
      <div data-afm-modal class="afm-hidden afm-fixed afm-inset-0 afm-z-50 afm-items-center afm-justify-center afm-bg-black/60 afm-backdrop-blur-sm afm-p-4">
        <div class="afm-bg-white afm-rounded-3xl afm-p-8 md:afm-p-12 afm-max-w-md afm-w-full afm-relative afm-shadow-2xl">
          <button data-afm-close-modal class="afm-absolute afm-top-4 afm-right-4 afm-w-10 afm-h-10 afm-rounded-full afm-bg-[#1a1a1a]/5 afm-flex afm-items-center afm-justify-center afm-text-[#1a1a1a]/50 hover:afm-bg-[#1a1a1a]/10 hover:afm-text-[#1a1a1a] afm-transition-all">
            <svg class="afm-w-5 afm-h-5" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M6 18L18 6M6 6l12 12"/></svg>
          </button>

          <div class="afm-text-center">
            <div class="afm-w-16 afm-h-16 afm-bg-[#ef3e36] afm-rounded-2xl afm-flex afm-items-center afm-justify-center afm-mx-auto afm-mb-6">
              <svg class="afm-w-8 afm-h-8 afm-text-white" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24"><path stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="2" d="M12 18h.01M8 21h8a2 2 0 002-2V5a2 2 0 00-2-2H8a2 2 0 00-2 2v14a2 2 0 002 2z"/></svg>
            </div>

            <h3 class="afm-text-2xl afm-font-bold afm-text-[#1a1a1a] afm-mb-3" style="font-family: 'Bubblebody New', sans-serif;">
              Get the Swapnice App
            </h3>
            <p class="afm-text-[#1a1a1a]/70 afm-mb-8" style="font-family: 'Varela Round', sans-serif;">
              Download Swapnice to activate your Action Figure Miles shoes and unlock exclusive access.
            </p>

            <div class="afm-flex afm-flex-col afm-gap-3">
              <a href="#" class="afm-flex afm-items-center afm-justify-center afm-gap-3 afm-bg-[#1a1a1a] afm-text-white afm-px-6 afm-py-4 afm-rounded-xl afm-font-semibold afm-transition-all hover:afm-bg-black hover:afm-scale-[1.02]" style="font-family: 'Varela Round', sans-serif;">
                <svg class="afm-w-6 afm-h-6" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="currentColor"><path d="M17.05 20.28c-.98.95-2.05.8-3.08.35-1.09-.46-2.09-.48-3.24 0-1.44.62-2.2.44-3.06-.35C2.79 15.25 3.51 7.59 9.05 7.31c1.35.07 2.29.74 3.08.8 1.18-.24 2.31-.93 3.57-.84 1.51.12 2.65.72 3.4 1.8-3.12 1.87-2.38 5.98.48 7.13-.57 1.5-1.31 2.99-2.54 4.09l.01-.01zM12.03 7.25c-.15-2.23 1.66-4.07 3.74-4.25.29 2.58-2.34 4.5-3.74 4.25z"/></svg>
                Download for iOS
              </a>
              <a href="#" class="afm-flex afm-items-center afm-justify-center afm-gap-3 afm-bg-[#1a1a1a] afm-text-white afm-px-6 afm-py-4 afm-rounded-xl afm-font-semibold afm-transition-all hover:afm-bg-black hover:afm-scale-[1.02]" style="font-family: 'Varela Round', sans-serif;">
                <svg class="afm-w-6 afm-h-6" viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="currentColor"><path d="M3.609 1.814L13.792 12 3.61 22.186a.996.996 0 01-.61-.92V2.734a1 1 0 01.609-.92zm10.89 10.893l2.302 2.302-10.937 6.333 8.635-8.635zm3.199-3.198l2.807 1.626a1 1 0 010 1.73l-2.808 1.626L15.206 12l2.492-2.491zM5.864 2.658L16.8 8.99l-2.302 2.302-8.634-8.634z"/></svg>
                Download for Android
              </a>
            </div>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>

    </div>

    <script>
      (() => {
        const root = document.getElementById('afm-activate');
        if (!root) return;

        const modal = root.querySelector('[data-afm-modal]');
        const openBtn = root.querySelector('[data-afm-open-modal]');
        const closeBtn = root.querySelector('[data-afm-close-modal]');

        function openModal() {
          if (!modal) return;
          modal.classList.remove('afm-hidden');
          modal.classList.add('afm-flex');
        }

        function closeModal() {
          if (!modal) return;
          modal.classList.add('afm-hidden');
          modal.classList.remove('afm-flex');
        }

        openBtn?.addEventListener('click', openModal);
        closeBtn?.addEventListener('click', closeModal);
        modal?.addEventListener('click', (e) => {
          if (e.target === modal) closeModal();
        });
        window.addEventListener('keydown', (e) => {
          if (e.key === 'Escape') closeModal();
        });
      })();
    </script>
  </body>
</html>
</file>

<file path="input.css">
@config "./tailwind.config.js";
@tailwind utilities;
</file>

<file path="package.json">
{
  "name": "pages",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "main": "tailwind.config.js",
  "scripts": {
    "build": "npx @tailwindcss/cli -i ./input.css -o ./afm-tailwind.css --minify",
    "watch": "npx @tailwindcss/cli -i ./input.css -o ./afm-tailwind.css --watch"
  },
  "keywords": [],
  "author": "",
  "license": "ISC",
  "description": "",
  "devDependencies": {
    "@tailwindcss/cli": "^4.1.18",
    "tailwindcss": "^4.1.18"
  }
}
</file>

<file path="tailwind.config.js">
/** @type {import('tailwindcss').Config} */
module.exports = {
  prefix: 'afm-',
  corePlugins: { preflight: false },
  content: ['./index.html', './**/*.html', './**/*.js'],
  theme: { extend: {} },
  plugins: [],
};
</file>
